column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The vibe is different. It's not just because I'm old and there's progress
column4: kind of blah & mainstream. The service remains top notch--fast refills
column6: on it. Â It's a well oiled machine that just works
column7: but why were the kids given hummus & carrots? I'd expect chickpeas
column8: but hummus? They loved the bread and oil
column9: but hummus? In Madrid & Barcelona they weren't served hummus. I also question why the bacon wrapped dates were deliberately made soggy with the citrus vinaigrette--just put them on a plate. Stab an apple with the toothpick
column12: EVER make bacon soggy. That's just not fair to the pig.
